description: John Kaniecki Sylvia  My love she lies beside me sleeping our dream  My breath is hushed as my pen dictates scream  She is the angel that makes life easy  She is the devil that knows how to please me  Lover, Friend, Doctor, Nurse, Mother and Wife  The steadfast anchor the Love of my life  How many angry words have you forgave?  How many times my life came to save?  I do not have any greater desire  Then to kiss your lips and embrace your fire  You are fantasy a lady and more  In agony the woman I adore  When the well is empty from you I drink  When my mind is barren your thoughts I think  You are my black rose delicately tough  I ask for more Iâ€™ll never have enough  I pray your inner hopes of righteousness  Will awaken you with fulfillmentâ€™s soft kiss  I am the sage you humble to a fool  I am a god your life I cannot rule  Sleep dear child as I chase futility  You will never know what you mean to me   Amy Farrell Schlereth

It didnâ€™t matter if they were royally pissed off- they would still calmly state their case in that tone with the occasional low key cuss word for effect to supersede their demeanor. Lovely people.  â¤ï¸
Rachel , I feel like you would have a similar response. â€œNot today, bears. I got crap to do. My kids are driving me nuts. Just go.â€

Looks like the effective way to do it, keep a safe distance and let your presence be known.  As long as you aren't harbouring an easy food source,  they will take their time and leave.  If they get testy, you have time to back up into the house.  And you can show your boss the video so they know you have a good excuse.

Haha Iâ€™m not sure this would always work with any bear.  This Canadian probably has a prior relationship with this bear as he neglected to apologize, which in Canada indicates a deep personal relationship.

Ambika Agrawal Calum Ward Divya Shah  idk if i told you guys but it's like last summer in sri lanka when a random dog just trotted in through the house entrance  ;)  i was like nah fam you gotta go then it looked at me and trotted right out

description: John Kaniecki Could one friend please copy and repost? I am trying to demonstrate that someone is always listening.    ðŸ’š ðŸ’š ðŸ’š ðŸ’š ðŸ’š ðŸ’š ðŸ’š ðŸ’š ðŸ’š   # SuicideAwareness    Just one person. Amy Farrell Schlereth

John Kaniecki If you challenge the official story you make people uncomfortable in two ways. One is that people are indoctrinated to equate their own self worth with the self worth of the nation. So if you say that the authorities are lying it becomes personal, like if somebody attacked family. Secondly if you propose something like multiple shooters in Las Vegas or 911 being detonated there is a serious disconnect from the official story and reality. People don't want to deal with the head ache of facing reality. That is why in society alcohol and other substances are prevalent it just helps people ignore reality. We live in a cynical world where we expect politicians to lie to us and not keep their promises yet the masses want to believe what the government tells us. Presently the United States along with Israel are aggressive nations bent on conquest. The two nations are conducting atrocities on the same level as Nazi Germany, or during the Colonial times of the British, Dutch or Spanish. Only the method of how these evil conglomerates deliver death change. Does it matter if people are gassed to death, or killed by drones or bombs, or are isolated in Gaza so they slowly starve to death, or simply enslaved and worked to death like Christopher Columbus did? In the end the indigenous peoples are slaughtered and their resources are stolen. Welcome to capitalistic United States I hope you survive the ride.

description: â€Ž John Kaniecki â€Ž Â  to Â  Charity Barriere Jones Love  By John Kaniecki  Love   Love is like is baking cookies of delight  You got to get the recipe just right  Start with a heaping measure of grace  If you did it correct, you have a smile on your face  Mix in some sugar, doubly sweet  Some kind words makes the task complete  Make sure that you include some of your heart  That is the extra special part  Allow the cookies to go through the fire  A little pain is needed, whatever the desire  Keep after them with proper concern  Otherwise they just might burn  Once they are baked allow them to cool  Move to fast, well youâ€™re a fool  Cause patience is the number one thing  You can always hum if you canâ€™t sing  Take a nibble just for a taste  Share with everybody let none go to waste  When your cookies are gone, just bake some more  Remember, make Love, not war  You would like my books of Christian poetry "A Day's Weather" or "Sunset Sonnets". Also there are my memoirs which talk about my battle with mental illness and my coming to Christ called "More Than The Madness"  Charity Barriere Jones

description: John Kaniecki I have a new blog.

John Kaniecki "What happens when Don â€˜Hypoâ€™ Colandri mysteriously disappears from Edwardâ€™s University on his way to a Statics exam? Why his three roommates lie outright claiming he was kidnapped by a Satanic cult, all to get money and score with chicks. Don, however, has been mysteriously transported into outer space where he becomes a pawn of one Nellie Watt against the Time Lords in a cosmic game being run by God. Unfortunately for Myron, Slick and Psycho, (Donâ€™s three former roommates) they have dived into a realm where fools tread. Hilda Thethia, a practicing Satanist, learns of the ruse and quickly begins to blackmail the trio. Sadly Myron, Slick and Psycho realize that the followers of Satan are more wide spread than they could have ever imagined and none are too happy at having the name of their Dark Lord besmirched. Meanwhile poor Don is learning the ropes of outer space in a very hard way. Every mystery he solves only brings more questions. Will Nellie Watt succeed in her contest against the Time Lords and go to the Twinkling of Twilights to press the Reset Button? Will Myron, Slick and Psycho manage to escape from the miserable maze they created? And most important of all, Why didnâ€™t YOU become a rock star?
